name: XEZI: A Silk Road Adventure
storyline: In the 9th Century C.E., the life is tough in your little mountain village. Winters are harsh and food is scarce. As the great empires rise and fall around you, your people only get poorer and become more oppressed. Everything changes one day when a horde of invaders carrying the plague burn down your village. Infected with a disease you don't know and left with nothing but your skin, you set out on the Silk Road to avenge your people and find a cure.
summary: Inspired by classic trading games and RPGs, XEZI is a single player experience where you play as a merchant who tries to save to world and make huge profits.
